verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Come forth, come forth from your father's house,
Come forth from all you've known;
A better country waits for you,
Say that you will go.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Step out, step out and do not fear,
Your journey's just begun;
A Helper waits to guide you on,
Until you're finally done.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Go in, go in to your husband's land,
The place has been prepared;
A house of promise waits for you,
And He will meet you there.
